alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:10PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Graham County through 515 PM MST... At 409 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 27 miles northwest of Thatcher to 10 miles east of Solomon. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Safford, Thatcher, Solomon, Roper Lake State Park, Safford Regional Airport, Pima, Bylas, Central, Fort Thomas, Swift Trail Junction and Frye Mesa Dam. This includes the following highways... Route 70 between mile markers 291 and 360. Route 191 between mile markers 109 and 139. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
